testCase.name: Given a TicTacToe board When the board is initialised Then a new board object is created
Given a TicTacToe board When the board is initialised Then a board printing method is created
Given a TicTacToe board When a mark is placed on the board Then the board should contain that mark
Given a TicTacToe board When a mark is placed on the board Then the board indicates that the cell is not empty
Given a TicTacToe board When the board checks for a winning condition And there are three of the same mark in the left column Then the board indicates that mark has won
Given a TicTacToe board When the board checks for a winning condition And there are three of the same mark in the left column Then the board vertical win-check returns the mark that has won
Given a TicTacToe board When the board checks for a winning condition And there are three of the same mark in the middle column Then the board indicates that mark has won
Given a TicTacToe board When the board checks for a winning condition And there are three of the same mark in the middle column Then the board vertical win-check returns the mark that has won
Given a TicTacToe board When the board checks for a winning condition And there are three of the same mark in the right column Then the board indicates that mark has won
Given a TicTacToe board When the board checks for a winning condition And there are three of the same mark in the right column Then the board vertical win-check returns the mark that has won
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is initialised Then a new player object is created
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is initialised Then the player's mark is set
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is taking their turn Then a mark is placed on the board
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is taking their turn And the cell is not empty Then the original mark is kept in the cell
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is taking their turn And the cell is not empty Then they place their mark in a different cell on the board
Given a TicTacToe game When a new game starts Then a new board is created
Given a TicTacToe game When a new game starts Then the "Game Board Creation..." message is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When a new game starts Then the empty board is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When a new game starts Then the "Board Created." message is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When a new game starts Then Player X is the current player
Given a TicTacToe game When a new game starts Then the "The game will start with player X" message is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the first round of the game And Player X places their mark on the board Then the mark will be added to the board
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the first round of the game And Player X places their mark on the board Then the "Player X:" message is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the first round of the game And Player X places their mark on the board Then the board with the new mark is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the first round of the game And Player X places their mark on the board Then the current player is set to Player O
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the second round of the game And Player O places their mark on the board Then the mark will be added to the board
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the second round of the game And Player O places their mark on the board Then the "Player O:" message is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the second round of the game And Player O places their mark on the board Then the board with the new mark is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When it is the last round of the game Then the final round of the game is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When Player X has placed their mark and the X marks fulfil a vertical winning condition Then the game is checking the board for a win
Given a TicTacToe game When Player X has placed their mark and the X marks fulfil a vertical winning condition Then the PLAYER X WON! message is printed
Given a TicTacToe game When Player X has placed their mark and Player X is announced as winner Then the game ends
